name: promptcloud_amazon-product-details-usa-2020
title: Amazon Product Details USA 2020
description:
This dataset contains a sample of 30K records of amazon products USA dated January to March 2020.

---
{"editor":"simple"}
---
### Context

This dataset was created by our in house teams at [PromptClou](https://www.promptcloud.com/) d and [DataStock](https://datastock.shop/) . This dataset contains 30K records of product details from amazon USA. You can download the full dataset [here](https://app.datastock.shop/?site_name=Amazon_USA_Product_Listings) . 

### Content

This dataset contains the following
Total Records Count:: 806353  
Domain Name: amazon.com  
Date Range: 01st Jan 2020 - 31st Mar 2020   
File Extension: CSV

Available Fields: Uniq Id, Crawl Timestamp, Pageurl, Ean, Lowest Price, Date Time Of Crawl Completion 

### Acknowledgements

We wouldn't be here without the help of our web scraping and data mining teams at PromptCloud and DataStock. 


### Inspiration
This dataset was created by the demand for product details and reviews from different e-commerce websites across the world. As we all know Amazon is the biggest and it made sense to start from there.
